title: Nyx eSports Club LF a Diamond 1+ Jungler
body:
Hey guys,
Nyx eSports Club is a high elo team that is currently in the process of recruiting a jungler for our OOL team. The goal for our team is to make through the OOL and into OCS and eventually OPL. We have a great group of support staff who are willing and able to help develop the players on an individual level as well as on a team level. We believe with the current roster and our current set up we will be able to make it into the OCS and are currently just in need of a jungler who can round out our team. If you are a high elo jungler who is looking for a team and also meets the requirements below, please either add myself in game 'Archfugle' or leave a comment below.

Requirements:
- High level of communication
- A good attitude
- Either a large champion pool or the will to learn and practice champions that are required
- TS3 and a working Mic
- Be able to attend all trainings throughout the week as well as OOL on the weekends (We can work a schedule out to suite you for the week)

Preferred:
- Diamond 1+ (will make exceptions for players in D3+ if you show a lot of potential), we believe there is a lot of new up and coming talent and will look to facilitate your growth if the potential is there.
- Previous ranked 5s experience
- Shotcalling ability or win to learn

replies.body:
Hi Archfugle

Is your team looking for any rookies to add to the team and help them improve. Currently Silver V, highest I have been is Silver 1. I can give at least 40 Hours a week to game time and take constructive criticism very well, I don't rage and am just keen to do the best I can!

I'm not quite Diamond 1, but if you provide me with enough stimuli I should be able to play to that standard, as I have my on and off days in terms of skill level. I'm very eager to join as I think I should be able to learn and communicate with the team quickly. All that's needed is for some proper motivation to be present and I can play well. 

Think about it. ^_^
Hey man ive already sent you a request from the previous post, just waiting on you to accept it haha
Oh, I never saw it haha. Which post was it?
